column4: sup all. would anyone be able to tell me what version of python comes ported on the latest version of ubuntu? i'm running 10.04 LTS, and I'm curious as to when the switch Python 3.x occur
ahh. sorry i didn't see the "default version" in the description
for a more generic overview across distribution versions, just use `any' rather than `oneiric' like I did: http://packages.ubuntu.com/search?keywords=python&searchon=names&suite=all&section=all
